TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripProfessionalRenderer extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer

summary.span: 通过应用自定义的调色板和简化的样式处理 对象的绘制功能。

span.span: Handles the painting functionality for objects, applying a custom palette and a streamlined style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建钢笔和画笔基于一个名为可替换颜色表。 creates pens and brushes based on a replaceable color table called . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建模拟的复合控件**导航窗格**Microsoft Outlook® 提供的。The following code example demonstrates how to create a composite control that mimics the **Navigation Pane** provided by Microsoft® Outlook®. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何： 创建具有专业样式的 ToolStrip 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-professionally-styled-toolstrip-control.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Create a Professionally Styled ToolStrip Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-professionally-styled-toolstrip-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RoundedEdges { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RoundedEdges : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件的边缘是否具有圆形外观，而非方形或尖角的外观。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether edges of controls have a rounded rather than a square or sharp appearance.

value.span: 表示圆润控件边缘；否则为 。
